text: Pen gos nɨgep God man ne alaŋ nɨb owup ak, binɨb kɨlop gek anɨgɨpal. Ned ak, kɨli God wɨdɨn adek sɨŋak gach sek ma mɨdɨl tep adek ak gɨpal. Pen kɨli kɨmɨgel mɨdtep gɨl, binɨb kɨlop sayn tep yɨbɨl mɨdɨl, takaw agel nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨpal. Kɨli binɨb kɨlop mapen nɨŋɨd, dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨpal. Kɨli binɨb adɨp adɨp mɨdebal ak nɨŋɨd, gos nɨgtep gɨl, kɨlop mɨdupsek adek nokom anɨb ak nep bɨlok lɨpal. Kɨli tap tay teplep gɨpal ak yepɨs ma gɨpal.
